channel.title: Yell command is to short,

item.title: Yell command is to short,
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:402074”]Get rid of
command.length() >= 0) {
c.sM(“Your’re message is too short!”);
return;
}[/quote]

i got it to work, this is final code

[code] if(command.startsWith(“yell”)) {

                           String

Title = "[Player] ";
if

(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR-NAME

")) Title = "[Owner] ";
if (playerRights == 3)

Title = "[Co-Owner] ";
if (playerRights == 2)

Title = "[Admin] ";
if (playerRights == 1)

Title = "[Moderator] ";
yell(Title + playerName

  • ": " + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

item.title: Yell command is to short,
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

i got a 317 server, and when ever i use my yell command it says message is to short

here is my command

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if

(command.length() >= 0) {
sM("You’re

message is too short!");
return;
}
String Title =

"[Player] ";
if

(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR-NAME

")) Title = "[Owner] ";
if (playerRights == 3)

Title = "[Co-Owner] ";
if (playerRights == 2)

Title = "[Admin] ";
if (playerRights == 1)

Title = "[Moderator] ";
yell(Title + playerName

  • ": " + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]
